column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I was not impressed by the absurd polish of the place
column2: nor the faux chic atmosphere. It took forever for someone to attend to me
column3: ask me for my order.  Then
column4: when my I got my croissant
column5: I realized it was day-old stale
column6: and the latte I ordered smelled not right
column7: with a hint of old milk
column8: and burnt.  Wow!  For a place with such high prices with very limited wifi at certain hours
column9: and with so many other great options in town
column10: why come back? I will not come back here again. Also
column11: parking is difficult!  Do not park here after 7pm as they will tow you!!  Common Bond is more like Common Bondage -- don't get caught up in the hype for nothing.
